attributes.action: CALL A GENERAL ELECTION AS WE THE PEOPLE HAVE LOST CONFIDENCE IN ALL MPS,s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A general election is needed so all MP.s have to fight for there jobs as we the public are at the moment

Gordon Brown is not an elected PM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
